title: The Cape Bears Brunt Of Blizzard's Onslaught
teaser: The snowstorm hitting the Northeast is having a big impact on Cape Cod, Mass. Steve Inskeep speaks with WCAI's Sean Corcoran for the latest on how residents and local officials are handling the storm.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
